Description:
Pushing open a chipped and decaying wooden door, you find yourself in an empty room.
In the center, lies a single chest.
Despite slight rusting around the edges, the box itself seems intact.

ChoiceDialogue: Creeping cautiously over to the chest, you attempt to lift the lid. However, it doesn't budge.
Turning away, you exit the room.

You try again, and realize the mistake was that it is a sliding box.
As the box slides open, it reveals two purple potions.

You muster your force before kicking the box with all your might.
The force of the impact destroys the box and shattering whatever is inside. You realize that some purple liquid is seeping out from the broken glass bottles. However, you'll never know what was inside.
Curious, you take the potions and store them in your bag.
The potions seem to suspicious, so you leave them and exit the room.
